document_api_meta.title: Edit Open Collaboration Sample Rule
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to manage sample rules in open collaborations, like valid time periods, or thresholds for creators to request samples. You can create, update, or deactivate rules.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: product_id
request_body_param.desc: The product ID to which the sample rule applies. You can only assign one sample rule for one `product_id`. Only the most recent API call will take effect.

request_body_param.name: ^sample_quota
request_body_param.desc: The total quantity of the samples provided by the seller that the creators can apply for.

request_body_param.name: ^is_sample_time_unlimited
request_body_param.desc:
Whether the sample is always available for application:
- If true, the sample can be requested at any time.
- If false, the sample can only be requested during specified time periods. You must set start_time and end_time.

request_body_param.name: ^start_time
request_body_param.desc: The start time of the period during which a creator can apply for samples. You must specify `start_time` and `end_time` together.

request_body_param.name: ^end_time
request_body_param.desc: The end time of the period during which a creator can apply for samples. You must specify `start_time` and `end_time` together.

request_body_param.name: ^thresholds
request_body_param.desc: The threshold criteria that a creator must meet to be eligible to apply for the sample.

request_body_param.name: ^^minimum_follower_count
request_body_param.desc: The creator must have a follower count greater than this value to be eligible to request the sample.

request_body_param.name: ^^minimum_gmv
request_body_param.desc: The creator must have the GMV in the past 30 days greater than this value to be eligible to request the sample.

request_body_param.name: ^^avg_ec_video_views
request_body_param.desc: The creator must have the average views of e-commerce videos in the past 30 days greater than this value to be eligible to request the sample.

request_body_param.name: ^^category_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A list of product first-level category IDs.
Use this to limit participating creators: for each creator, sort their GMV over the past 30 days by first-level product category. If the GMV of one of the categories is among the top three, the creator is eligible to participate in the event. No restriction by default.
For example, if a creator's top three categories are [{Cellphone_ID}, {Furniture_ID}, {Food_ID}], and the value of tehis parameter is `[{Food_ID}]`, the creator is qualified for open collaboration.

request_body_param.name: ^^predicted_fulfillment_rank
request_body_param.desc:
The creators whose predicted rate of posting a shoppable video or LIVE after receiving a sample.
- ALL. All creators regardless of the rate.
- LOW. The creators whose rate is above or equal to low.
- MEDIUM. The creators whose rate is above or equal to medium.
- HIGH. The creators whose rate is high.

request_body_param.name: ^activate_status
request_body_param.desc:
To activate the sample rule, use `ACTIVATE`; to deactivate the sample rule, use `DEACTIVATE`.
When using `ACTIVATE`, you must specify the details of the rule; when using `DEACTIVATE`, you just need to specify `product_id`.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRulePost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliateSellerV202410API.AffiliateSeller202410OpenCollaborationsSampleRulesPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBody := affiliateSeller_v202410.NewAffiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBody()
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBody.SetProductId("123456")
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule := affiliateSeller_v202410.NewAffiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule()
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule.SetSampleQuota(100)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule.SetIsSampleTimeUnlimited(true)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule.SetStartTime(1728552553)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule.SetEndTime(1728552553)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds := affiliateSeller_v202410.NewAffiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds()
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds.SetMinimumFollowerCount(2000)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds.SetMinimumGmv(1000)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds.SetAvgEcVideoViews(5)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholdsCategoryIdsList := []string{"601152"}
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds.SetCategoryIds(affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholdsCategoryIdsList)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds.SetPredictedFulfillmentRank("LOW")
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule.SetThresholds(*affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRuleThresholds)
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule.SetActivateStatus("ACTIVATE")
    affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBody.SetSampleRule(*affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBodySampleRule)
    request = request.AffiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBody(*affiliateSeller202410EditOpenCollaborationSampleRuleRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to manage a Seller's TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including creating collaborations, editing collaborations, searching collaborations, approving/rejecting creators, finding/adding/removing creators, generating affiliate links, managing affiliate orders and monitoring collaboration activity and performance.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to manage a your TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including creating collaborations, editing collaborations, approving/rejecting creators, finding/adding/removing creators, generating affiliate links, managing affiliate orders and monitoring collaboration activity and performance.
